title: Mick Cleary's Talking Rugby: The greatest set of quarter-finals ever staged at a Rugby World Cup await this weekend
text:
Rugby World Cup 2019 has already created many special memories, thrown up its fair share of controversies, too, but its finest accolade is that it is about to play host to the greatest set of quarter-finals ever staged. The four ties are all rich with possibility, spiced with unpredictability and sumptuous talent, a double-day line-up that has you checking itineraries to see if it is actually possible to be in four places across one weekend. Not even the Shinkansen bullet train can manage that. The only answer to that conundrum is to be in front of a television. Stock those fridges, raids those larders, this is the weekend from rugby heaven.

You could be entranced by any of the four fixtures:...
description: Rugby World Cup 2019 has already created many special memories, thrown up its fair share of controversies, too, but its finest accolade is that it is about to play host to the greatest set of quarter-finals ever staged.
